column2: Waterloo Community School District Create a strong foundation in math for all students in the WCSD. Supplement the curriculum in the 2014-2015 school year with instruction in basic facts and algorithms.
column5:
We believe our children are being used in an educational experiment that many experts in the field of mathematics believe has already failed.

\r\n

Our children are falling behind their peers who are in classrooms with direct instruction,Board President"
